CONTINUIDAD DE UNA FUNCIÃ“N - Ejercicio 1

Hallar [imath] h [/imath] para que [imath] f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{lr}{3 h x+1} & {\text { si } x \leq 3} \\ {2 x^{2}+h x-5} & {\text { si } x>3}\end{array}\right. [/imath]\nsea CONTINUA en [imath] \mathbb{R} [/imath][imath]{3 h x+1} & {\text { si } x \leq 3} [/imath] [imath] {2 x^{2}+h x-5} & {\text { si } x>3}[/imath]
